sentence.Network_en: Existing papers did not cover the new communities journalistically.
sentence.Network_cn: 现存的报纸并没有在新闻上照顾新城镇.

sentence.Network_en: He is being journalistically crucified in his own country.
sentence.Network_cn: 据记者说,他将在自己的国家被钉死在十字架上.

sentence.Network_en: He became known , journalistically as the Mystery Man of Maryland.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是本杰明成了马里兰州的奇人,出了名.

auth_sentence.content: I believe he thinks this is journalistically cute; and that he is environmentally biased against large dams.
